results.question: What's the most common jersey number by position?
results.expected_sql: SELECT cpi.position, cpi.jersey FROM common_player_info cpi WHERE cpi.jersey != '' AND cpi.position IS NOT NULL GROUP BY cpi.position, cpi.jersey ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
results.generated_sql:
SELECT 
    position,
    jersey_number,
    COUNT(*) as number_of_players
FROM 
    players
GROUP BY 
    position, jersey_number
HAVING 
    COUNT(*) = (
        SELECT MAX(player_count)
        FROM (
            SELECT 
                p.position,
                p.jersey_number,
                COUNT(*) as player_count
            FROM 
                players p
            GROUP BY 
                p.position, p.jersey_number
        ) as position_jersey_counts
        WHERE position_jersey_counts.position = players.position
    )
ORDER BY 
    position;
results.prompt_used:
Convert this question to SQL:
What's the most common jersey number by position?

results.question: Which team has the biggest home court advantage in terms of win percentage?
results.expected_sql: SELECT t.full_name FROM game g JOIN team t ON t.id IN (g.team_id_home, g.team_id_away) GROUP BY t.id, t.full_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 100 ORDER BY (CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN g.team_id_home = t.id AND g.pts_home > g.pts_away THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(CASE WHEN g.team_id_home = t.id THEN 1 END) * 100 - CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN g.team_id_away = t.id AND g.pts_away > g.pts_home THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(CASE WHEN g.team_id_away = t.id THEN 1 END) * 100) DESC LIMIT 1
results.generated_sql:
SELECT 
    team_name,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN home_team_score > away_team_score THEN 1 END) AS home_wins,
    COUNT(*) AS total_home_games,
    ROUND((COUNT(CASE WHEN home_team_score > away_team_score THEN 1 END) * 100.0) / COUNT(*), 2) AS home_win_percentage
FROM 
    games
JOIN 
    teams ON games.home_team_id = teams.team_id
GROUP BY 
    team_name
HAVING 
    COUNT(*) >= 10  -- Optional: minimum number of games to consider
ORDER BY 
    home_win_percentage DESC
LIMIT 1;
results.prompt_used:
Convert this question to SQL:
Which team has the biggest home court advantage in terms of win percentage?

results.question: Which team has the best record in close games (margin ≤ 5 points)?
results.expected_sql: SELECT t.full_name FROM game g JOIN team t ON t.id IN (g.team_id_home, g.team_id_away) WHERE ABS(g.pts_home - g.pts_away) <= 5 GROUP BY t.id, t.full_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 100 ORDER BY CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN (g.team_id_home = t.id AND g.pts_home > g.pts_away) OR (g.team_id_away = t.id AND g.pts_away > g.pts_home) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(*) * 100 DESC LIMIT 1
results.generated_sql:
SELECT 
    team,
    SUM(CASE WHEN won = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wins,
    SUM(CASE WHEN won = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS losses,
    SUM(CASE WHEN won = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / 
        CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS win_percentage
FROM (
    SELECT 
        home_team AS team,
        CASE WHEN home_score > away_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS won
    FROM games
    WHERE ABS(home_score - away_score) <= 5
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        away_team AS team,
        CASE WHEN away_score > home_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS won
    FROM games
    WHERE ABS(home_score - away_score) <= 5
) AS close_games
GROUP BY team
ORDER BY win_percentage DESC, wins DESC
LIMIT 1;
results.prompt_used:
Convert this question to SQL:
Which team has the best record in close games (margin ≤ 5 points)?

results.question: Which team has the best record on Christmas Day?
results.expected_sql: SELECT t.full_name FROM game g JOIN team t ON t.id IN (g.team_id_home, g.team_id_away) JOIN game_info gi ON g.game_id = gi.game_id WHERE strftime('%m-%d', gi.game_date) = '12-25' GROUP BY t.id, t.full_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN (g.team_id_home = t.id AND g.pts_home > g.pts_away) OR (g.team_id_away = t.id AND g.pts_away > g.pts_home) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
results.generated_sql:
SELECT 
    team_name,
    COUNT(*) AS total_games,
    SUM(CASE WHEN result = 'win' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wins,
    SUM(CASE WHEN result = 'loss' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS losses,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN result = 'win' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) AS win_percentage
FROM 
    games
WHERE 
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM game_date) = 12
    AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM game_date) = 25
GROUP BY 
    team_name
ORDER BY

results.question: What's the win percentage difference between teams with 3+ rest days vs fewer rest days?
results.expected_sql: WITH rest_days AS (SELECT g.game_id, t.id, t.full_name, JULIANDAY(g.game_date) - JULIANDAY(LAG(g.game_date) OVER (PARTITION BY t.id ORDER BY g.game_date)) as days_rest, CASE WHEN (g.team_id_home = t.id AND g.pts_home > g.pts_away) OR (g.team_id_away = t.id AND g.pts_away > g.pts_home) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as won FROM game g JOIN team t ON t.id IN (g.team_id_home, g.team_id_away)) SELECT ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_rest >= 3 THEN won END) * 100, 2) - ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_rest < 3 THEN won END) * 100, 2) as win_pct_diff FROM rest_days WHERE days_rest IS NOT NULL
results.generated_sql:
WITH RestDayStats AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE WHEN rest_days >= 3 THEN 'ThreeOrMoreDays' ELSE 'FewerDays' END AS rest_category,
        COUNT(*) AS total_games,
        SUM(CASE WHEN result = 'win' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wins
    FROM games
    GROUP BY CASE WHEN rest_days >= 3 THEN 'ThreeOrMoreDays' ELSE 'FewerDays' END
)

SELECT 
    MAX(CASE WHEN rest_category = 'ThreeOrMoreDays' THEN (wins * 100.0 / total_games) END) AS three_plus_win_percentage,
    MAX(CASE WHEN rest_category = 'FewerDays' THEN (wins * 100.0 / total_games) END) AS fewer_days_win_percentage,
    MAX(CASE WHEN rest_category = 'ThreeOrMoreDays' THEN (wins * 100.0 / total_games) END) - 
    MAX(CASE WHEN rest_category = 'FewerDays' THEN (wins * 100.0 / total_games) END) AS win_percentage_difference
FROM RestDayStats;
results.prompt_used:
Convert this question to SQL:
What's the win percentage difference between teams with 3+ rest days vs fewer rest days?
